dammit somebody downvate this beautiful man until he has exactly 3 or 6 upvotes
Dammit, everything about this is so beautiful.
I like the little twist on this one.

I already loved where the meme was going, but seeing the twist made it 20x better LOL.

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I can't help but wonder what the point fo stacking so much is when we're going to lose anyways. None of those stacks matter when the game is over.

Stacks are a drug. I had to stop playing Veigar because of it. Seeing those tiny numbers go up one by one is euphoric. The outcome of the game no longer matters. All that matters is seeing that number go up. You tell yourself you'll stop at 300. Your team begs you to stop at 400. But you won't. You can't. You no longer have control. You don't care how high the stacks go. You just want to see the numbers increase. One. By. One.
I remember when these gru memes flooded r/deepfriedmemes
this is exactly what this meme needed.
changing the order of pics actually made me laugh out loud enough to wake up my sleeping roommate
I play nasus and farm top/ i fight the laner/ their jungler shows up/ and  their mid (in normal gru meme format)
